mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(email, password, name, position, create_date) VALUES(#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{position}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "id", NAME AS "name", EMAIL AS "email", POSITION AS "position", CREATE_DATE AS "createDate", DELETE_DATE AS "deleteDate" FROM MEMBER ORDER BY ID, NAME LIMIT #{startNum}, #{perCnt}
